ovdesc.p: Date field that is maintained by thesystem when repayment or adjustment is made on PD.
Holds the RECORD.START.DATE value of PD.BALANCES
This file will be updated by a start of day. This will contain the calculation basis and the details of the last repayment/adjustment done.
When penalty calculation in PD is based on ?OP? then this field would get updated as OP when PD is created.
Holds the projected LLR date when back-dated repayment prior to LLR date is done.
